languages.text: {n}Наглотавшись собственной крови и еле отдышавшись, вы вновь обретаете способность слышать. Голос великана гремит над воем смерча.{/n} "Довольно. Даже если ты и касал{mf|ся|ась} реликвии моего владыки, сейчас она не с тобой. Что ж, слуги Истины разыщут ее и вернут в родное лоно. С тобой же... с тобой разберутся иные слуги Истины".

{n}After swallowing down your blood and barely catching your breath, you regain the ability to hear. The giant's voice roars over the howling of the whirlwind,{/n} "Enough. Even if you have touched my master's relic, it is not with you now. Very well, servants of the Truth will seek it out and bring it back into the fold. As for you... other servants of the Truth will deal with you."
languages.original_text: {n}Наглотавшись собственной крови и еле отдышавшись, вы вновь обретаете способность слышать. Голос великана гремит над воем смерча.{/n} "Довольно. Даже если ты и касал{mf|ся|ась} реликвии моего владыки, сейчас она не с тобой. Что ж, слуги Истины разыщут ее и вернут в родное лоно. С тобой же... с тобой разберутся иные слуги Истины".

traits.locale_text: {n}Having swallowed enough of your blood, barely catching your breath, you regain the ability to hear. Uralon's voice roars over the howling of the whirlwind,{/n} "Enough. Even if you have touched my master's relic, it is not with you now. Very well, servants of the Truth will seek it out and bring it back into the fold. As for you... other servants of the Truth will deal with you."

Even if you have touched my master's relic, it is not with you now. Very well, servants of the Truth will seek it out and bring it back into the fold. As for you... other servants of the Truth will deal with you."

languages.text: {n}Tras tragarte la sangre y recuperar el aliento a duras penas, también recobras la capacidad de oír. La voz del gigante retumba por encima del vendaval.{/n} «Ya basta. Aunque hayas tocado la reliquia de mi amo, no la tienes contigo. De acuerdo, los sirvientes de la Verdad la recuperarán y la traerán de vuelta al redil. En cuanto a ti... otros sirvientes de la Verdad se ocuparán de ti».
languages.original_text: {n}After swallowing down your blood and barely catching your breath, you regain the ability to hear. The giant's voice roars over the howling of the whirlwind,{/n} "Enough. Even if you have touched my master's relic, it is not with you now. Very well, servants of the Truth will seek it out and bring it back into the fold. As for you... other servants of the Truth will deal with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras tragar sangre en abundancia y recuperando el aliento a duras penas, también recobras la capacidad de oír. La voz del gigante retumba por encima del vendaval.{/n} «Ya basta. Aunque hayas tocado la reliquia de mi amo, no la tienes contigo. De acuerdo, los sirvientes de la Verdad la recuperarán y la traerán de vuelta al redil. En cuanto a ti... otros sirvientes de la Verdad se ocuparán de ti».

languages.text: {n}血を飲み干し、なんとか息を整えて聴力を取り戻した。巨人の声が旋風の中で轟いている。{/n}「もうよい。たとえお前が主の遺物に触れたとしても、今お前の手元にはない。ならば真実の従者どもにそれを探し出し、取り戻してもらおう。お前の処遇は…他の真実の従者どもに決めてもらう」
languages.original_text: {n}After swallowing down your blood and barely catching your breath, you regain the ability to hear. The giant's voice roars over the howling of the whirlwind,{/n} "Enough. Even if you have touched my master's relic, it is not with you now. Very well, servants of the Truth will seek it out and bring it back into the fold. As for you... other servants of the Truth will deal with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}血を飲み干し、なんとか息を整えて聴力を取り戻した。巨人の声が旋風の中で轟いている。{/n}「もうよい。たとえお前が主の遺物に触れたとしても、今お前の手元にはない。ならば真実の従者どもにそれを探し出し、取り戻してもらおう。お前の処遇は…他の真実の従者どもに決めてもらう」

languages.text: {n}不知道咽下了多少口血之后，你终于勉强恢复了呼吸和听力。巨人洪亮的声音盖过了风暴的呼啸，{/n}“够了。就算你真的触碰过我主人的圣物，它现在也不在你身边。很好，原初真理的仆人自会把它找出来，把它带回我们的行伍之中。至于你……原初真理的其他仆人自会对付你。”
languages.original_text: {n}After swallowing down your blood and barely catching your breath, you regain the ability to hear. The giant's voice roars over the howling of the whirlwind,{/n} "Enough. Even if you have touched my master's relic, it is not with you now. Very well, servants of the Truth will seek it out and bring it back into the fold. As for you... other servants of the Truth will deal with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}不知道咽下了多少口血之后，你终于勉强恢复了呼吸和听力。巨人洪亮的声音盖过了风暴的呼啸，{/n}“够了。就算你真的触碰过我主人的圣物，它现在也不在你身边。很好，原初真理的仆人自会把它找出来，把它带回我们的行伍之中。至于你……原初真理的其他仆人自会对付你。”

languages.text: {n}Après avoir avalé votre propre sang et manqué de vous étouffer, vous retrouvez enfin l'ouïe. La voix du géant retentit par-dessus le rugissement du tourbillon.{/n} « Assez. Vous avez peut-être touché la relique de mon maître, mais vous n'êtes plus en sa possession. Les serviteurs de la Vérité vont partir à sa recherche et la mettront en lieu sûr. Quant à vous... je laisse à d'autres serviteurs le soin de s'occuper de votre cas. »
languages.original_text: {n}After swallowing down your blood and barely catching your breath, you regain the ability to hear. The giant's voice roars over the howling of the whirlwind,{/n} "Enough. Even if you have touched my master's relic, it is not with you now. Very well, servants of the Truth will seek it out and bring it back into the fold. As for you... other servants of the Truth will deal with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Alors que vous étiez sur le point de vous étouffer dans votre propre sang, vous commencez difficilement à reprendre votre souffle et retrouvez l'ouïe. La voix du géant retentit par-dessus le rugissement du tourbillon.{/n} « Assez. Vous avez peut-être touché la relique de mon maître, mais vous n'êtes plus en sa possession. Les serviteurs de la Vérité vont partir à sa recherche et la mettront en lieu sûr. Quant à vous... je laisse à d'autres serviteurs le soin de s'occuper de votre cas. »

languages.text: {n}Nachdem du genug von deinem Blut geschluckt hast und wieder einigermaßen bei Atem bist, kannst du wieder etwas hören. Die Stimme des Riesen erhebt sich brüllend über das Heulen des Wirbelsturms:{/n} "Genug. Selbst, wenn Ihr das Relikt meines Meisters berührt habt, Ihr habt es nicht bei Euch. Also gut, Diener der Wahrheit werden es finden und heimholen. Und was Euch angeht ... andere Diener der Wahrheit werden sich um Euch kümmern."
languages.original_text: {n}After swallowing down your blood and barely catching your breath, you regain the ability to hear. The giant's voice roars over the howling of the whirlwind,{/n} "Enough. Even if you have touched my master's relic, it is not with you now. Very well, servants of the Truth will seek it out and bring it back into the fold. As for you... other servants of the Truth will deal with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nachdem du genug von deinem Blut geschluckt hast und wieder einigermaßen bei Atem bist, kannst du wieder etwas hören. Die Stimme des Riesen erhebt sich brüllend über das Heulen des Wirbelsturms:{/n} "Genug. Selbst, wenn Ihr das Relikt meines Meisters berührt habt, Ihr habt es nicht bei Euch. Also gut, Diener der Wahrheit werden es finden und heimholen. Und was Euch angeht ... andere Diener der Wahrheit werden sich um Euch kümmern."

languages.text: {n}Kanını yutup nefesini zar zor toparladıktan sonra duyma yetin geri dönüyor. Devin fırtınayı dindiren sesini duyuyorsun.{/n} "Yeter. Efendimin yadigârına elin değmiş olsa da artık malikiyetinde değil. Pekâlâ, Hakikat'in hizmetkârları yadigârı bulup ait olduğu yere kavuşturacaktır. Sana gelince... Seninle diğer hizmetkârlar ilgilenecek."
languages.original_text: {n}After swallowing down your blood and barely catching your breath, you regain the ability to hear. The giant's voice roars over the howling of the whirlwind,{/n} "Enough. Even if you have touched my master's relic, it is not with you now. Very well, servants of the Truth will seek it out and bring it back into the fold. As for you... other servants of the Truth will deal with you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kanını yutup nefesini zar zor toparladıktan sonra duyma yetin geri dönüyor. Devin fırtınayı dindiren sesini duyuyorsun.{/n} “Yeter. Efendimin yadigârına elin değmiş olsa da o, artık sende değil. Pekâlâ, Hakikat’in hizmetkârları yadigârı bulup ait olduğu yere teslim edecektir. Sana gelince... Seninle diğer hizmetkârlar ilgilenecek.”
